title: Time Machines
alt: 'All time machine systems nominal... T-minus ten... eleven ...'
transcript:
The problem with time machines:
[Cueball has his hands on the lever of a time machine.][Cueball flips the switch from OFF to ON.]
Click
...eeEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEeee...
Click
[Cueball flips the switch from ON to OFF.]
???
[Cueball is puzzled.]
